no-queued-posts: There are no comments in the comment queue.
no-single-post: The post or comment you are looking for is no longer in the queue. It has likely been approved or deleted already.
enabling-help: The comment queue is currently disabled. To enable this feature, go to Settings → Post → Post Queue and enable Post Queue.
public-intro: If you have any queued comments, they will be shown here.
public-description:
This forum is configured to automatically queue comments from new accounts, pending moderator approval.
If you have queued comments awaiting approval, you will be able to see them here.
title: Title
confirm-reject: Do you want to reject this comment?
confirm-remove: Do you want to remove this comment?
reject-all-confirm: Do you want to reject all comments?
reject-selected-confirm: Do you want to reject %1 selected comments?
remove-all-confirm: Do you want to remove all comments?
remove-selected-confirm: Do you want to remove %1 selected comments?
